description:
A Pikachu that belongs to the instructor in the Pok√©mon League entrance exam.
It is randomly given to James who thinks he can win against the intructors Graveler because he has been `blasted off` so many times by Ash`s Pikachu.
After James order the exam Pikachu to use an electric attack on Graveler he shortly lost the battle. He later attempted to get Pikachu to attack the Instructor but Pikachu turned around and attacked James instead.
name: Pikachu (Kyoukan)
